abstract: The bank said it would pay $30 million and improve its monitoring and compliance practices in regard to the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act.
snippet: The bank said it would pay $30 million and improve its monitoring and compliance practices in regard to the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America must pay a $30 million fine after a financial regulator found numerous violations related to the accounts of 73,000 military service members.

headline.main: Bank of America Fined for Violations of Military Relief Law
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Bank Is Fined Over Military Account Violations

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
